short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click to export X/Twitter community member list to CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scrape and Extract member list from any X/Twitter community, and then save the list member user information to a CSV/Excel/JSON file.

HOW TO USE?

1. Input the URL of a community.
2. Click the start button.

X/TWITTER TOOLS FAMILY
You can access other Twitter tools from the Tools page by clicking on the menu.

- TwDM - Auto Send DM for Twitter
- TwScraper - Export followers and following
- TwSearch - Export search results to CSV

ðŸ‘‹ FAQ

TWList utilizes the Twitter website to fetch list members & followers. Due to website limitations, Twitter may not always display all data on the site.

For more information: https://twcommunityexport.extensionsfox.com/#faq
For any inquiries, please contact us at help@extensionsfox.com.

ðŸ”’ DATA PRIVACY
All data is processed on your local computer, never passing through our web server, ensuring privacy. No one else can access the data you save.
